rooms.description: This space is designed as a welcoming area with a central courtyard view, promoting positive energy according to Vastu. The layout directs flow towards the living spaces.
A peaceful retreat aligned in the north-east sector, ensuring good sleep and energy according to Vastu principles. Includes built-in wardrobe and a window for natural light.
A modest bedroom with sufficient lighting and ventilation, placed in the west sector to maintain balance and energy flow.
Dedicated workspace designed with ample lighting and a view of the central courtyard for inspiration. It is aligned in the north sector, following Vastu principles.
Efficient industrial-style kitchen designed with modern appliances and ample storage. It is positioned in the south-west sector to maintain functional workflow.
A compact and functional living space for the domestic help, designed with essential amenities. Placed in the south-east area to balance energy flow.
A small, intimate space adjacent to the kitchen for dining. The positioning aligns with Vastu principles ensuring a peaceful mealtime environment.

openings.description: A welcoming entryway that leads directly to the entrance hall, ensuring a smooth flow of energy.
Large windows that allow natural light and maintain a connection with the central courtyard.
Provides access to the outdoor space, enhancing ventilation and energy flow as per Vastu guidelines.
